targets.rawSql: SELECT COUNT(*) as value FROM execution_results WHERE kpi_measurement_ms IS NOT NULL AND $__timeFilter(executed_at)

SELECT ROUND((COUNT(CASE WHEN kpi_measurement_success = true THEN 1 END)::numeric / NULLIF(COUNT(*), 0)) * 100, 2) as value FROM execution_results WHERE kpi_measurement_ms IS NOT NULL AND $__timeFilter(executed_at)

SELECT er.action_set_id, AVG(er.kpi_measurement_ms) as avg_kpi, (SELECT kpi_report_url FROM execution_results er2 LEFT JOIN navigation_trees nt2 ON er2.tree_id = nt2.id LEFT JOIN userinterfaces ui2 ON nt2.userinterface_id = ui2.id WHERE er2.action_set_id = er.action_set_id AND ui2.name = 'horizon_android_tv' AND er2.kpi_report_url IS NOT NULL AND $__timeFilter(er2.executed_at) ORDER BY er2.executed_at DESC LIMIT 1) as report_url FROM execution_results er LEFT JOIN navigation_trees nt ON er.tree_id = nt.id LEFT JOIN userinterfaces ui ON nt.userinterface_id = ui.id WHERE er.kpi_measurement_ms IS NOT NULL AND ui.name = 'horizon_android_tv' AND $__timeFilter(er.executed_at) GROUP BY er.action_set_id ORDER BY avg_kpi DESC

SELECT er.action_set_id, AVG(er.kpi_measurement_ms) as avg_kpi, (SELECT kpi_report_url FROM execution_results er2 LEFT JOIN navigation_trees nt2 ON er2.tree_id = nt2.id LEFT JOIN userinterfaces ui2 ON nt2.userinterface_id = ui2.id WHERE er2.action_set_id = er.action_set_id AND ui2.name = 'horizon_tv' AND er2.kpi_report_url IS NOT NULL AND $__timeFilter(er2.executed_at) ORDER BY er2.executed_at DESC LIMIT 1) as report_url FROM execution_results er LEFT JOIN navigation_trees nt ON er.tree_id = nt.id LEFT JOIN userinterfaces ui ON nt.userinterface_id = ui.id WHERE er.kpi_measurement_ms IS NOT NULL AND ui.name = 'horizon_tv' AND $__timeFilter(er.executed_at) GROUP BY er.action_set_id ORDER BY avg_kpi DESC

SELECT er.action_set_id, COUNT(*) as count, (SELECT kpi_report_url FROM execution_results er2 LEFT JOIN navigation_trees nt2 ON er2.tree_id = nt2.id LEFT JOIN userinterfaces ui2 ON nt2.userinterface_id = ui2.id WHERE er2.action_set_id = er.action_set_id AND ui2.name = 'horizon_android_tv' AND er2.kpi_report_url IS NOT NULL AND $__timeFilter(er2.executed_at) ORDER BY er2.executed_at DESC LIMIT 1) as report_url FROM execution_results er LEFT JOIN navigation_trees nt ON er.tree_id = nt.id LEFT JOIN userinterfaces ui ON nt.userinterface_id = ui.id WHERE er.kpi_measurement_ms IS NOT NULL AND ui.name = 'horizon_android_tv' AND $__timeFilter(er.executed_at) GROUP BY er.action_set_id ORDER BY count DESC

SELECT er.action_set_id, COUNT(*) as count, (SELECT kpi_report_url FROM execution_results er2 LEFT JOIN navigation_trees nt2 ON er2.tree_id = nt2.id LEFT JOIN userinterfaces ui2 ON nt2.userinterface_id = ui2.id WHERE er2.action_set_id = er.action_set_id AND ui2.name = 'perseus_360_web' AND er2.kpi_report_url IS NOT NULL AND $__timeFilter(er2.executed_at) ORDER BY er2.executed_at DESC LIMIT 1) as report_url FROM execution_results er LEFT JOIN navigation_trees nt ON er.tree_id = nt.id LEFT JOIN userinterfaces ui ON nt.userinterface_id = ui.id WHERE er.kpi_measurement_ms IS NOT NULL AND ui.name = 'perseus_360_web' AND $__timeFilter(er.executed_at) GROUP BY er.action_set_id ORDER BY count DESC

targets.rawSql: SELECT er.action_set_id, COUNT(*) as count, (SELECT kpi_report_url FROM execution_results er2 LEFT JOIN navigation_trees nt2 ON er2.tree_id = nt2.id LEFT JOIN userinterfaces ui2 ON nt2.userinterface_id = ui2.id WHERE er2.action_set_id = er.action_set_id AND ui2.name = 'horizon_android_mobile' AND er2.kpi_report_url IS NOT NULL AND $__timeFilter(er2.executed_at) ORDER BY er2.executed_at DESC LIMIT 1) as report_url FROM execution_results er LEFT JOIN navigation_trees nt ON er.tree_id = nt.id LEFT JOIN userinterfaces ui ON nt.userinterface_id = ui.id WHERE er.kpi_measurement_ms IS NOT NULL AND ui.name = 'horizon_android_mobile' AND $__timeFilter(er.executed_at) GROUP BY er.action_set_id ORDER BY count DESC

panels.title: KPI Count by Action Set - horizon_android_mobile

targets.rawSql: SELECT ui.name as user_interface, er.action_set_id, AVG(er.kpi_measurement_ms) as avg_kpi, (SELECT kpi_report_url FROM execution_results er2 LEFT JOIN navigation_trees nt2 ON er2.tree_id = nt2.id LEFT JOIN userinterfaces ui2 ON nt2.userinterface_id = ui2.id WHERE er2.action_set_id = er.action_set_id AND ui2.name = ui.name AND er2.kpi_report_url IS NOT NULL AND $__timeFilter(er2.executed_at) ORDER BY er2.executed_at DESC LIMIT 1) as report_url FROM execution_results er LEFT JOIN navigation_trees nt ON er.tree_id = nt.id LEFT JOIN userinterfaces ui ON nt.userinterface_id = ui.id WHERE er.kpi_measurement_ms IS NOT NULL AND $__timeFilter(er.executed_at) GROUP BY ui.name, er.action_set_id ORDER BY avg_kpi DESC LIMIT 20

panels.title: Top Slowest Action Sets by User Interface

targets.rawSql: SELECT er.executed_at as "Executed At", ui.name as "User Interface", er.action_set_id as "Action Set ID", er.host_name as "Host Name", er.device_model as "Device Model", nt.name as "Tree Name", er.kpi_measurement_ms as "KPI Time (ms)", er.kpi_measurement_success as "Success", er.kpi_measurement_error as "Error", kpi_report_url as Report FROM execution_results er LEFT JOIN navigation_trees nt ON er.tree_id = nt.id LEFT JOIN userinterfaces ui ON nt.userinterface_id = ui.id WHERE er.kpi_measurement_ms IS NOT NULL AND $__timeFilter(er.executed_at) ORDER BY er.executed_at DESC LIMIT 1000

SELECT er.action_set_id, ROUND(AVG(er.kpi_measurement_ms)) as avg_kpi FROM execution_results er LEFT JOIN navigation_trees nt ON er.tree_id = nt.id LEFT JOIN userinterfaces ui ON nt.userinterface_id = ui.id WHERE er.kpi_measurement_ms IS NOT NULL AND ui.name = 'horizon_tv' AND $__timeFilter(er.executed_at) GROUP BY er.action_set_id ORDER BY er.action_set_id

SELECT er.action_set_id, ROUND(AVG(er.kpi_measurement_ms)) as avg_kpi FROM execution_results er LEFT JOIN navigation_trees nt ON er.tree_id = nt.id LEFT JOIN userinterfaces ui ON nt.userinterface_id = ui.id WHERE er.kpi_measurement_ms IS NOT NULL AND ui.name = 'horizon_android_tv' AND $__timeFilter(er.executed_at) GROUP BY er.action_set_id ORDER BY er.action_set_id

SELECT er.action_set_id, ROUND(AVG(er.kpi_measurement_ms)) as avg_kpi FROM execution_results er LEFT JOIN navigation_trees nt ON er.tree_id = nt.id LEFT JOIN userinterfaces ui ON nt.userinterface_id = ui.id WHERE er.kpi_measurement_ms IS NOT NULL AND ui.name = 'horizon_android_mobile' AND $__timeFilter(er.executed_at) GROUP BY er.action_set_id ORDER BY er.action_set_id

SELECT er.action_set_id, ROUND(AVG(er.kpi_measurement_ms)) as avg_kpi FROM execution_results er LEFT JOIN navigation_trees nt ON er.tree_id = nt.id LEFT JOIN userinterfaces ui ON nt.userinterface_id = ui.id WHERE er.kpi_measurement_ms IS NOT NULL AND ui.name = 'perseus_360_web' AND $__timeFilter(er.executed_at) GROUP BY er.action_set_id ORDER BY er.action_set_id

list.label: User Interface
list.name: user_interface
list.query: SELECT DISTINCT ui.name FROM execution_results er LEFT JOIN navigation_trees nt ON er.tree_id = nt.id LEFT JOIN userinterfaces ui ON nt.userinterface_id = ui.id WHERE er.kpi_measurement_ms IS NOT NULL ORDER BY ui.name

list.label: Action Set
list.name: action_set
list.query: SELECT DISTINCT action_set_id FROM execution_results WHERE kpi_measurement_ms IS NOT NULL ORDER BY action_set_id
